summary: A mod with inspiration from the nordic cultures of Sweden, Norway and Denmark. With other words the viking culture.
descriptionHtml:
This mod contains two quests with inspiration from the nordic cultures of Sweden, Iceland, Norway and Denmark. With other words the viking culture. You will learn the real language of Skyrim, the ancient language Urnordiska (Swedish in this case). You start the first quest by talking to a guy named Karl in the marketplace of Solitude. The mod is fully voiced. If you have any questions, comments or complains feel free to write them in the comment section.

Place the files in the skyrim/data folder to install or just download with \"Mod Manager\"

If you like the mod, don\'t forget to come back in an hour to endorse :)

------------
Also available on Steam Workshop

------------
http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=dCOT2rPO4q0

Thanks to gruntman438 for this mod review

The boat problem which is shown in the video is fixed in update 2.0.
------------
Update 2.0: The mod have now been updated and a new quest is available. Just talk to Ingvar at the boat to start it. And as always, if you like it don\'t forget to like or favorite! 
The boat problem and other stuff is now fixed.

-------------
Many thanks to Joi_Kind (steam name) for the Icelandic voice acting!
author: iller
